Maithili (English: /ˈmaɪtɪli/) bụ asụsụ Indo-Aryan a na-asụ n'akụkụ India na Nepal
A mụrụ ya na mpaghara Mithila, nke gụnyere akụkụ nke steeti India nke Bihar na Jharkhand yana ọwụwa anyanwụ Terai nke Nepal
Ọ bụ otu n'ime asụsụ iri abụọ na abụọ a ma ama na India na asụsụ nke abụọ a na-asụkarị na mba Nepal.
A na-edekarị asụsụ ahụ na Devanagari, mana enwere edemede abụọ ọzọ dị mkpa n'akụkọ ihe mere eme: Tirhuta, nke nọgidere na-eji ya eme ihe ruo ugbu a, na Kaithi.
